verses.verse: And in the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%>, on the <S%H259>first<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month<s%>, ye shall have a <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation<s%>; ye shall <S%H6213>do<s%> no <S%H5656>servile<s%> <S%H4399>work<s%>: it is a <S%H3117>day<s%> of blowing of trumpets unto <S%H8643>you<s%>.

And ye shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> a <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%> for a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>savor<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1241>young<s%> <S%H6499>bullock<s%>, <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H352>ram<s%>, <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3532>he-lambs<s%> <S%H1121>a<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> old without <S%H8549>blemish<s%>;

and their <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%>, fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with <S%H8081>oil<s%>, <S%H7969>three<s%> tenth <S%H6241>parts<s%> for the <S%H6499>bullock<s%>, <S%H8147>two<s%> tenth <S%H6241>parts<s%> for the <S%H352>ram<s%>,
and <S%H259>one<s%> tenth <S%H6241>part<s%> for <S%H259>every<s%> <S%H3532>lamb<s%> of the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3532>lambs<s%>;
and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8163>he<s%> - <S%H8163>goat<s%> for a <S%H2403>sin-offering<s%>, to make atonement for <S%H3722>you<s%>;

besides the <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%> of the new <S%H2320>moon<s%>, and the <S%H5930>meal-offering<s%> <S%H8548>thereof<s%>, and the continual <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%> and the <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%> <S%H5262>thereof<s%>, and their drink-offerings, according unto their <S%H4941>ordinance<s%>, for a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>savor<s%>, an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And on the <S%H6218>tenth<s%> day of this <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> ye shall have a <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation<s%>; and ye shall <S%H6031>afflict<s%> your <S%H5315>souls<s%>: ye shall <S%H6213>do<s%> no manner of <S%H4399>work<s%>;

but ye shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> a <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> for a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>savor<s%>: <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1241>young<s%> <S%H6499>bullock<s%>, <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H352>ram<s%>, <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3532>he-lambs<s%> <S%H1121>a<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H8549>old<s%>; they shall be unto you without blemish;

and their <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%>, fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with <S%H8081>oil<s%>, <S%H7969>three<s%> tenth <S%H6241>parts<s%> for the <S%H6499>bullock<s%>, <S%H8147>two<s%> tenth <S%H6241>parts<s%> for the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H352>ram<s%>,
a tenth <S%H6241>part<s%> for <S%H259>every<s%> <S%H3532>lamb<s%> of the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3532>lambs<s%>:

one <S%H259><s%> <S%H2403>he<s%> - goat for a sin-offering; besides the <S%H2403>sin-offering<s%> of <S%H3725>atonement<s%>, and the <S%H8548>continual<s%> <S%H2403>burnt-offering<s%>, and the <S%H2403>meal-offering<s%> thereof, and their drink-offerings.

And on the <S%H2568>fifteenth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> ye shall have a <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation<s%>; ye shall <S%H6213>do<s%> no <S%H5656>servile<s%> <S%H4399>work<s%>, and ye shall <S%H2287>keep<s%> a <S%H2282>feast<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>:

and ye shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> a <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%>, an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%>, of a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>savor<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; <S%H7969>thirteen<s%> <S%H1241>young<s%> <S%H6499>bullocks<s%>, <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H352>rams<s%>, <S%H702>fourteen<s%> <S%H3532>he-lambs<s%> <S%H1121>a<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H8549>old<s%>; they shall be without blemish;

and their <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%>, fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with <S%H8081>oil<s%>, <S%H7969>three<s%> tenth <S%H6241>parts<s%> for <S%H259>every<s%> <S%H6499>bullock<s%> of the <S%H7969>thirteen<s%> <S%H6499>bullocks<s%>, <S%H8147>two<s%> tenth <S%H6241>parts<s%> for <S%H259>each<s%> <S%H352>ram<s%> of the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H352>rams<s%>,
and a tenth <S%H6241>part<s%> for <S%H259>every<s%> <S%H3532>lamb<s%> of the <S%H702>fourteen<s%> <S%H3532>lambs<s%>;

and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8163>he<s%> - <S%H5795>goat<s%> for a <S%H2403>sin-offering<s%>, besides the <S%H8548>continual<s%> <S%H2403>burnt-offering<s%>, the <S%H2403>meal-offering<s%> <S%H5930>thereof<s%>, and the drink-offering thereof.

And on the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> ye shall offer <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H6499>bullocks<s%>, <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H352>rams<s%>, <S%H702>fourteen<s%> <S%H3532>he-lambs<s%> <S%H1121>a<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> old without <S%H8549>blemish<s%>;

and their <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%> and their <S%H5262>drink-offerings<s%> for the <S%H6499>bullocks<s%>, for the <S%H352>rams<s%>, and for the <S%H3532>lambs<s%>, according to their <S%H4557>number<s%>, after the <S%H4941>ordinance<s%>;

and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8163>he<s%> - <S%H5795>goat<s%> for a <S%H2403>sin-offering<s%>; besides the <S%H8548>continual<s%> <S%H2403>burnt-offering<s%>, and the <S%H2403>meal-offering<s%> <S%H5262>thereof<s%>, and their drink-offerings.

And on the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H6249>eleven<s%> <S%H6499>bullocks<s%>, <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H352>rams<s%>, <S%H702>fourteen<s%> <S%H3532>he-lambs<s%> <S%H1121>a<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> old without <S%H8549>blemish<s%>;

and their <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%> and their <S%H5262>drink-offerings<s%> for the <S%H6499>bullocks<s%>, for the <S%H352>rams<s%>, and for the <S%H3532>lambs<s%>, according to their <S%H4557>number<s%>, after the <S%H4941>ordinance<s%>;

and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8163>he<s%> - goat for a <S%H2403>sin-offering<s%>; besides the <S%H8548>continual<s%> <S%H2403>burnt-offering<s%>, and the <S%H5930>meal-offering<s%> <S%H5930>thereof<s%>, and the drink-offering thereof.

And on the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H6499>bullocks<s%>, <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H352>rams<s%>, <S%H702>fourteen<s%> <S%H3532>he-lambs<s%> <S%H1121>a<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> old without <S%H8549>blemish<s%>;

their <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%> and their <S%H5262>drink-offerings<s%> for the <S%H6499>bullocks<s%>, for the <S%H352>rams<s%>, and for the <S%H3532>lambs<s%>, according to their <S%H4557>number<s%>, after the <S%H4941>ordinance<s%>;

and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8163>he<s%> - <S%H5795>goat<s%> for a <S%H2403>sin-offering<s%>; besides the <S%H8548>continual<s%> <S%H2403>burnt-offering<s%>, the <S%H2403>meal-offering<s%> <S%H5262>thereof<s%>, and the drink-offering thereof.

And on the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H6499>bullocks<s%>, <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H352>rams<s%>, <S%H702>fourteen<s%> <S%H3532>he-lambs<s%> <S%H1121>a<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> old without <S%H8549>blemish<s%>;

and their <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%> and their <S%H5262>drink-offerings<s%> for the <S%H6499>bullocks<s%>, for the <S%H352>rams<s%>, and for the <S%H3532>lambs<s%>, according to their <S%H4557>number<s%>, after the <S%H4941>ordinance<s%>;

and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8163>he<s%> - goat for a <S%H2403>sin-offering<s%>, besides the <S%H8548>continual<s%> <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%>, and the <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%> <S%H5930>thereof<s%>, and the drink-offering thereof.

And on the <S%H8345>sixth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H6499>bullocks<s%>, <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H352>rams<s%>, <S%H702>fourteen<s%> <S%H3532>he-lambs<s%> <S%H1121>a<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> old without <S%H8549>blemish<s%>;

and their <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%> and their <S%H5262>drink-offerings<s%> for the <S%H6499>bullocks<s%>, for the <S%H352>rams<s%>, and for the <S%H3532>lambs<s%>, according to their <S%H4557>number<s%>, after the <S%H4941>ordinance<s%>;

and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8163>he<s%> - goat for a <S%H2403>sin-offering<s%>; besides the <S%H8548>continual<s%> <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%>, the <S%H2403>meal-offering<s%> <S%H5262>thereof<s%>, and the drink-offerings thereof.

And on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6499>bullocks<s%>, <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H352>rams<s%>, <S%H702>fourteen<s%> <S%H3532>he-lambs<s%> <S%H1121>a<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> old without <S%H8549>blemish<s%>;

and their <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%> and their <S%H5262>drink-offerings<s%> for the <S%H6499>bullocks<s%>, for the <S%H352>rams<s%>, and for the <S%H3532>lambs<s%>, according to their <S%H4557>number<s%>, after the <S%H4941>ordinance<s%>;

and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8163>he<s%> - goat for a <S%H2403>sin-offering<s%>; besides the <S%H8548>continual<s%> <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%>, the <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%> <S%H5262>thereof<s%>, and the drink-offering thereof.
On the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> ye shall have a solemn <S%H6116>assembly<s%>: ye shall <S%H6213>do<s%> no <S%H5656>servile<s%> <S%H4399>work<s%>;

but ye shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> a <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%>, an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%>, of a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>savor<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6499>bullock<s%>, <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H352>ram<s%>, <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3532>he-lambs<s%> <S%H1121>a<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> old without <S%H8549>blemish<s%>;

their <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%> and their <S%H5262>drink-offerings<s%> for the <S%H6499>bullock<s%>, for the <S%H352>ram<s%>, and for the <S%H3532>lambs<s%>, shall be according to their <S%H4557>number<s%>, after the <S%H4941>ordinance<s%>:

and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8163>he<s%> - goat for a <S%H2403>sin-offering<s%>, besides the <S%H8548>continual<s%> <S%H2403>burnt-offering<s%>, and the <S%H5930>meal-offering<s%> <S%H5930>thereof<s%>, and the drink-offering thereof.

These ye shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> in your set <S%H4150>feasts<s%>, besides your <S%H5088>vows<s%>, and your <S%H5071>freewill-offerings<s%>, for your <S%H5930>burnt-offerings<s%>, and for your <S%H4503>meal-offerings<s%>, and for your <S%H5262>drink-offerings<s%>, and for your <S%H8002>peace-offerings<s%>.
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>told<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> according to all that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.
